ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Feeling kinda useless sometimes
ygData.msgSnippet: To prove it to the group.  You alone camp out.  Sing no songs when you return and happily run about in obvious chase range of mobs.  Then let the other group
ygData.messageBody:
To prove it to the group. You alone camp out. Sing no songs when you
return and happily run about in obvious chase range of mobs. Then let the
other group members go into chase range one at a time until something
auto-pulls. That's the guy on the lists. If you pulse a song on him you
too will be on all those lists.
<snip>

*waves to Kenross* Hullo :) I had an issue like there at the Sarknak Fort
in the Lake of Ill Omen. We just stood there and everything ran to us -
well me. Every mob came at me :) but then I could not blame them I am just
so cute. Ummm anyways... My group started to yell for me to log so I did.
Me alone. And guess what happened? The mobs still came and they started to
beat on the cleric instead. *LOL* He screams like a girl - ON ME ON ME.
Don't think he's ever going to ask me to log again...

Jacana Mourningsong
Wood Elf of the 29th song (Woohoo level last night)
<Crimson Dragons> Innoruuk
